task.title: Enable Shift Swapping
task.shortdesc: Shift swapping can be enabled per scheduling team to give employees more flexibility.

taskbody.context:
Two options must be set to Yes when creating or editing a scheduling team:
Employees Can View Team Schedule
Allow Shift Swapping

step.cmd: Select Yes for the Allow Employee Giveaway Shift to Unassigned option if employees should be able to give away their shift without a replacement. This option places the shift in the "unassigned" shifts.
Select Yes for the Manager Approval Required For Shift Swap option if managers are required to approve all shift swaps.
Select Yes for the Allow Shift Swap with Any Employee option in order for employees to swap shifts with any employee rather than a selected employee.

ul.li: Accept First Offer - Employee can quickly swap a shift with the first person who accepts the offer to take the shift. This option follows the manager approval configuration for shift swap.

Let Requester Choose - Multiple employees may accept the offer to swap. The employee is empowered to choose the desired shift to swap with. After one swap is complete, the remaining are canceled. This option follows the manager approval configuration for shift swap.
